articles.description: Anil Jayaraj, Viacom18 Sports, CEO, says Indian Premier League will be free to watch on Jio Cinema. The platform is eyeing ad revenue of Rs 3,000-4,000 crore and a reach of 500 million for IPL.
articles.content:
Anil Jayaraj, Viacom18 Sports, CEO, says Indian Premier League will be free to watch on Jio Cinema. The platform is eyeing ad revenue of Rs 3,000-4,000 crore and a reach of 500 million for IPL.
